channel.title: Caspian Almerud - Generalist Developer
channel.description: Generalist developer bridging technical expertise with creative problem-solving. Full-stack development, blockchain, AI/ML, interactive art, and business strategy.

item.title: The Generalist vs Specialist Developer: Why I Choose the T-Shape
item.description: Exploring the career paths of generalist vs specialist developers, the benefits of T-shaped skills, and why being a technical generalist might be your competitive advantage.
item.author: hello@caspian.dev (Caspian Almerud)

item.title: Modern Full-Stack Architecture: From Monolith to Microservices
item.description: A comprehensive guide to designing scalable full-stack applications, covering architecture patterns, technology choices, and real-world implementation strategies.
item.author: hello@caspian.dev (Caspian Almerud)

item.title: Building a Pixel-Perfect Developer Portfolio in 2024
item.description: How I designed and built a retro-inspired developer portfolio using pixel art aesthetics, modern web technologies, and performance optimization techniques.
item.author: hello@caspian.dev (Caspian Almerud)

item.title: 10 Essential Tips for Business Growth in 2024
item.description: Discover proven strategies to accelerate your business growth and reach new heights in the competitive market.
item.author: hello@caspian.dev (Caspian Almerud)

item.title: The Future of Technology: Trends Shaping Business in 2024
item.description: Explore emerging technologies and their impact on modern businesses. Learn how to prepare for the technological revolution ahead.

item.title: Customer Success Stories: How Our Platform Transforms Businesses
